Module LB08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.deck

Class DeckWithRevealedCards

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.deck.Deck
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.deck.DeckWithRevealedCards
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCardDeck, ObjectiveCardDeck, ResourceCardDeck
public abstract class DeckWithRevealedCards extends Deck
This abstract class represents a deck of cards that can have two cards revealed on the table at a time, one on the left and one on the right.
